column4: Anyway this keynote speaker (Dr. Jonathon Jackson) is phenomenal and if you’re interested, you should check out his work (https://t.co/ddGnGGr7H5)
If anyone wants to watch a recording of the webinar go ahead and DM me, it looks like it’ll be available for free!

perpetuates the racism that’s so ingrained in medicine. When you only study how Alzheimer’s affects white people, you don’t know how it will progress in Black people. Racism is so ingrained in every aspect of medicine. the whole institution has to be torn down and rebuilt. 2/3

I’m spending my morning at a conference on racial disparities in clinical research (particularly dementia). However bad you think it is, it’s worse. Research is so painfully white-dominated, both in leadership and participation. Because research informs treatment, this 1/3
